hero.subtitle: Web Development, SEO Specialist, System Administrator
hero.title: brings real results
hero.description: passionate about technology and web development. I approach each project with enthusiasm, curiosity, and determination, always seeking new challenges to grow both technically and personally. I collaborate with a team spirit and use my skills to achieve concrete goals together.

header.title: My Services
header.description: I am a web designer specialized in creating and optimizing modern websites, carefully designed to offer maximum functionality. I provide a full range of services including:

descriptions.ux: I use the best technologies available combined with rigorous standards to deliver a beautiful website appreciated by your users.
descriptions.seo: I handle digital marketing and SEO to help companies build an effective online presence, achieve tangible results, and truly grow.
descriptions.web: I focus on web design and development, creating modern, functional websites optimized to provide the best user experience on every device.
